value:
$WmMPID_春祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|I had a strong hunch that you
and your companions would
make it this far.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|I think they survived this long
just to face me again. Right,
$Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|Your progression has been
impressive. You are proving to
have great potential.$k$pBut the question remains, can
you take all of us on at once?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|Let's start the final battle.
Spring is here—so let's see
who wins the season!$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_春祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|You won! Congratulations.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|We beat them all, and it was
entirely thanks to you,
$Nu!$k$pAnd guess what the winning
team gets? A year's supply of
carrots, of course!$k$pAren't we the lucky ones.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|Not so fast, Princess Sharena.
You think you're getting away
with the victory carrots...$k$pwithout wearing the proper
attire?$k$pYou're the winner of the spring
festival, after all. You have to wear
a springy costume like mine.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Wh-what?! I have to dress up like
a rabbit? How embarrassing!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|Oh, sweetie, there's nothing
embarrassing about it. You'll
look adorable.$k$pYou might even surpass us
all in rabbity fashion. Now,
this way to the costumes...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|But...um...we were just leaving!
I can't...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|Well, let's leave them to their
business while we wrap up ours.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|Indeed! I declare this spring
festival to have come to a close.
But as for all of us...$k$pI think that you need only call, and
we will surely come running.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|Agreed. Should you summon us,
we'll be there, carrots and spring
gear in hand, ready to battle.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|I would also like to take this
opportunity to state that I don't
usually dress like this.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|I'd jump at the chance to wear this
if we meet again. It's odd...but a
nice change for me.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_SpringFes17,Face|$w0|Surely we shall all meet again.
Now, may spring blessings be
yours, festival victors!$k$Sbs150|
